title: "Best Buy names Deborah DiSanzo top healthcare exec"
excerpt: "Best Buy named a veteran of IBM Watson and Philips Healthcare to lead its healthcare division. During the second quarter earnings call on Aug. 25, Best Buy CEO Corie Barry announced the company hired Deborah DiSanzo as its new president of Best Buy Health."
